To make a cheese pizza, start by preheating the oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit. Then, roll out the pizza dough and spread it out on a greased baking sheet. Sprinkle the dough with Parmesan cheese, then top it with mozzarella cheese and any other desired toppings. Finally, bake the pizza for 12-15 minutes until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

To make a cheese pizza, start by preheating the oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit. Then, roll out the pizza dough and place it on a greased baking sheet. Spread a layer of pizza sauce over the dough and sprinkle it with shredded cheese. Finally, bake the pizza for 15-20 minutes until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown.
